text: Romina Francesca Power (born October 2, 1951) is an American actress and singer. She appeared in several mainly Italian-language movies from the age of 14, including the 1969 version of the Marquis de Sade's novel Justine, directed by Jesus Franco. In 2005, Power was a judge in the Italian TV show Ballando con le Stelle (Dancing with the Stars).Spettacoli.tiscali.it , Romina Power: "Addio lascio l'Italia"Tgcom.Ã¹rfozdry/oy , La Power: "Italia addio per sempre" ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles
